Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Let me first understand the standard P2P flow: Standard P2P sequence: 1. Create Purchase Requisition (PR) 2. Approve Purchase Requisition (Approval must happen before PO issuance) 3. Issue Purchase Order (PO) - sent to vendor after approval 4. Receive Goods (Goods receipt - happens after PO is issued and vendor delivers) 5. Vendor Invoice Received (Invoice arrives, typically after goods received or around same time) 6. Match Invoice to PO (Three-way match: PO, Goods Receipt, Invoice) 7. Release Payment (Payment after matching/verification) 8. Close Case

Timeline makes sense.
